00048 def exportHtml(fname, fields, result, writeTitle):
00049         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00050         try:
00051                 f = codecs.open( fname, 'wb+', 'utf8' )
00052                 f.write( '<html>' )
00053                 f.write( '<head><title>' + _('OpenERP exported information') + '</title></head>' )
00054                 f.write( '<table>' )
00055                 if writeTitle:
00056                         f.write( '<tr>' )
00057                         for x in fields:
00058                                 x = unicode(x)
00059                                 f.write('<th>%s</th>' % x)
00060                         f.write( '</tr>' )
00061                 for x in result:
00062                         row = []
00063                         for y in x:
00064                                 y = unicode(y)
00065                                 y = y.replace('\n','<br/>').replace('\t','&nbsp;')
00066                                 y = y.replace('<','&lt;').replace('>','&gt;').replace('&','&amp;')
00067                                 row.append(y)
00068                         f.write( '<tr>' )
00069                         f.write( '<td>%s</td>' % ( '</td><td>'.join( row ) ) )
00070                         f.write( '</tr>' )
00071                 f.close()
00072                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00073                 QMessageBox.information( None, _('Information'), _('%s record(s) saved!') % (str(len(result))) )
00074         except IOError, (errno, strerror):
00075                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00076                 QMessageBox.warning( None, _('Error'), _("Operation failed !\nI/O error (%s)") % (errno))
00077 
00078 def textToCsv(text):
00079         return '"%s"' % text.replace('\n',' ').replace('\t', ' ').replace('"','\\"')
00080 
00081 def exportCsv(fname, fields, result, writeTitle):
00082         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00083         try:
00084                 fp = codecs.open( fname, 'wb+', 'utf8' )
00085                 if writeTitle:
00086                         fp.write( ','.join( [textToCsv(x) for x in fields] ) + '\n' )
00087                 for data in result:
00088                         row = []
00089                         for d in data:
00090                                 if isinstance(d, str):
00091                                         row.append( textToCsv(d) )
00092                                 elif not isinstance( d, unicode ):
00093                                         row.append( textToCsv(unicode(d)) )
00094                                 else:
00095                                         row.append( textToCsv(d) )
00096                         fp.write( ','.join( row ) + '\n' )
00097                 fp.close()
00098                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00099                 QMessageBox.information( None, _('Data Export'), _('%s record(s) saved!') % (str(len(result))) )
00100         except IOError, (errno, strerror):
00101                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00102                 QMessageBox.warning( None, _('Data Export'), _("Operation failed !\nI/O error (%s)") % (errno))
00103         except Exception, e:
00104                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00105                 QMessageBox.warning( None, _('Data Export'), _("Error exporting data:\n%s") % unicode(e.args) )
00106 
00107 ## @brief Converts the given list of lists (data) into the appropiate type so Excel and OpenOffice.org
00108 # set the appropiate cell format.
00109 def convertTypes(data, fieldsType):
00110         for a in data:
00111                 for b in range(len(a)):
00112                         if type(a[b]) == type(''):
00113                                 a[b]=a[b].decode('utf-8','replace')
00114                         elif type(a[b]) == type([]):
00115                                 if len(a[b])==2:
00116                                         a[b] = a[b][1].decode('utf-8','replace')
00117                                 else:
00118                                         a[b] = ''
00119                         if fieldsType[b] in ('float', 'integer'):
00120                                 if Numeric.isNumeric( a[b] ):
00121                                         a[b] = float( a[b] )
00122         return data
00123 
00124 def openExcel(fields, fieldsType, result, writeTitle):
00125         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00126         try:
00127                 from win32com.client import Dispatch
00128                 application = Dispatch("Excel.Application")
00129                 application.Workbooks.Add()
00130 
00131                 sheet = application.ActiveSheet
00132                 row = 1
00133                 if writeTitle:
00134                         for col in range(len(fields)):
00135                                 sheet.Cells( row, col + 1 ).Value = fields[col]
00136                         row += 1
00137 
00138                 result = convertTypes( result, fieldsType )
00139                 sheet.Range(sheet.Cells(row, 1), sheet.Cells(row + len(result)-1, len(fields))).Value = result
00140                 
00141                 application.Visible = 1
00142                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00143         except Exception, e:
00144                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00145                 QMessageBox.warning(None, _('Error'), _('Error opening Excel:\n%s') % unicode(e.args) )
00146 
00147 # Based on code by Dukai Gabor posted in openobject-client bugs:
00148 # https://bugs.launchpad.net/openobject-client/+bug/399278 
00149 def openOpenOffice(fields, fieldsType, result, writeTitle):
00150         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00151         try:
00152                 import time
00153 
00154                 OpenOffice.OpenOffice.start()
00155 
00156                 for i in range(30):
00157                         ooo = OpenOffice.OpenOffice()
00158                         if ooo and ooo.desktop:
00159                                 break
00160                         time.sleep(1)
00161                 doc = ooo.desktop.loadComponentFromURL("private:factory/scalc",'_blank',0,())
00162                 sheet = doc.CurrentController.ActiveSheet
00163 
00164                 row = 0
00165                 if writeTitle:
00166                         for col in xrange(len(fields)):
00167                                 cell = sheet.getCellByPosition(col, row)
00168                                 cell.String = fields[col]
00169                         row += 1
00170 
00171                 result = convertTypes( result, fieldsType )
00172                 result = tuple( [tuple(x) for x in result] )
00173 
00174                 cellrange = sheet.getCellRangeByPosition(0, row, len(fields) - 1, row + len(result) - 1)
00175                 cellrange.setDataArray(result)
00176                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00177         except Exception, e:
00178                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00179                 QMessageBox.warning(None, _('Error'), _('Error Opening OpenOffice.org:\n%s') % unicode(e.args) )
00180 
00181 def exportData(ids, model, fields, prefix=''):
00182         data = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model, 'export_data', ids, fields, Rpc.session.context)
00183         # After 5.0 data is returned directly (no 'datas' key in a dictionary).
00184         if isinstance(data, dict) and 'datas' in data:
00185                 data = data['datas']
00186         return data

00190 class ExportDialog( QDialog, ExportDialogUi ):
00191         exports = {}
00192 
00193         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00194                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00195                 ExportDialogUi.__init__(self)
00196                 self.setupUi( self )
00197 
00198                 self.ids = []
00199                 self.model = None
00200                 self.fields = None
00201                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.export )
00202                 self.connect( self.pushCancel, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.reject )
00203                 self.connect( self.pushAdd, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.add )
00204                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.remove )
00205                 self.connect( self.pushRemoveAll, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.removeAll )
00206                 self.connect( self.pushSave, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.save )
00207                 self.connect( self.pushRemoveExport, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.removeExport )
00208                 self.connect( self.uiPredefined, SIGNAL('activated(const QModelIndex&)'), self.loadCurrentStored )
00209 
00210         def setModel( self, model ):
00211                 self.model = model
00212 
00213         def setIds( self, ids ):
00214                 self.ids = ids
00215 
00216         def setup( self, viewTypes, viewIds ):
00217                 self.viewTypes = viewTypes
00218                 self.viewIds = viewIds
00219                 QTimer.singleShot( 0, self.initGui )
00220 
00221         def initGui(self):
00222                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00223                 # Pick up information of all available fields in all current views.
00224                 try:
00225                         self.fields = {}
00226                         queue = ViewQueue()
00227                         queue.setup( self.viewTypes, self.viewIds )
00228                         while not queue.isEmpty():
00229                                 id, type = queue.next()
00230                                 view = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model, 'fields_view_get', id, type, Rpc.session.context)
00231                                 self.fields.update( view['fields'] )
00232                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00233                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00234                         return
00235 
00236                 for key, export in ExportDialog.exports.iteritems():
00237                         self.uiFormat.addItem( export['label'], QVariant( key ) )       
00238 
00239                 self.fieldsInfo = {}
00240                 self.allModel = FieldsModel()
00241                 self.allModel.load( self.fields, self.fieldsInfo )
00242                 self.uiAllFields.setModel( self.allModel )
00243                 self.uiAllFields.sortByColumn( 0, Qt.AscendingOrder )
00244 
00245                 self.selectedModel = FieldsModel()
00246                 self.uiSelectedFields.setModel( self.selectedModel )
00247 
00248                 self.storedModel = StoredExportsModel()
00249                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )
00250                 self.uiPredefined.setModel( self.storedModel )
00251                 self.uiPredefined.hideColumn(0)
00252                 self.uiPredefined.hideColumn(1)
00253 
00254                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00255 
00256         @staticmethod
00257         def registerExport(key, label, requiresFileName, function):
00258                 ExportDialog.exports[ key ] = {
00259                         'label': label,
00260                         'requiresFileName': requiresFileName,
00261                         'function': function
00262                 }
00263 
00264         @staticmethod
00265         def unregisterExport(key):
00266                 del ExportDialog.exports[ key ]

00268         def removeExport(self):
00269                 idx = self.uiPredefined.selectionModel().selectedRows(1)
00270                 if len(idx) != 1:
00271                         return
00272                 idx = idx[0]
00273                 id = int( unicode( self.storedModel.itemFromIndex( idx ).text() ) )
00274                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00275                 ir_export.unlink([id])
00276                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )
00277 
00278         def loadCurrentStored(self):
00279                 idx = self.uiPredefined.selectionModel().selectedRows(0)
00280                 if len(idx) != 1:
00281                         return
00282                 idx = idx[0]
00283                 fields = unicode( self.storedModel.itemFromIndex( idx ).text() )
00284                 fields = fields.split(', ') 
00285                 if self.selectedModel.rowCount() > 0:
00286                         self.selectedModel.removeRows(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() )
00287                 for x in fields:
00288                         newItem = QStandardItem()
00289                         newItem.setText( unicode( self.fieldsInfo[x]['string'] ) )
00290                         newItem.setData( QVariant(x) )
00291                         self.selectedModel.appendRow( newItem )
00292 
00293         def export(self):
00294                 fields = []
00295                 fieldTitles = []
00296                 for x in range(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() ):
00297                         fields.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item( x ).data().toString() ) )
00298                         fieldTitles.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item( x ).text() ) )
00299                 action = unicode( self.uiFormat.itemData(self.uiFormat.currentIndex()).toString() )
00300                 result = exportData(self.ids, self.model, fields)
00301                 export = ExportDialog.exports[action]
00302                 if export['requiresFileName']:
00303                         fileName = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName( self, _('Export Data') )
00304                         export['function'](fileName, fieldTitles, result, self.uiAddFieldNames.isChecked() )
00305                 else:
00306                         fieldsType = [self.fieldsInfo[x]['type'] for x in fields]
00307                         export['function'](fieldTitles, fieldsType, result, self.uiAddFieldNames.isChecked() )
00308 
00309         def add(self):
00310                 idx = self.uiAllFields.selectionModel().selectedRows()
00311                 if len(idx) != 1:
00312                         return 
00313                 idx = idx[0]
00314                 item = self.allModel.itemFromIndex( idx )
00315                 newItem = QStandardItem( item )
00316                 newItem.setText( self.fullPathText(item) )
00317                 newItem.setData( QVariant(self.fullPathData(item)) )
00318                 self.selectedModel.appendRow( newItem )
00319 
00320         def remove(self):
00321                 idx = self.uiSelectedFields.selectedIndexes()
00322                 if len(idx) != 1:
00323                         return
00324                 idx = idx[0]
00325                 self.selectedModel.removeRows( idx.row(), 1 )
00326 
00327         def removeAll(self):
00328                 if self.selectedModel.rowCount() > 0:
00329                         self.selectedModel.removeRows(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount())
00330 
00331         def fullPathText(self, item):
00332                 path = unicode( item.text() )
00333                 while item.parent() != None:
00334                         item = item.parent()
00335                         path = item.text() + "/" + path
00336                 return path
00337         
00338         def fullPathData(self, item):
00339                 path = unicode( item.data().toString() )
00340                 while item.parent() != None:
00341                         item = item.parent()
00342                         path = item.data().toString() + "/" + path
00343                 return path
00344 
00345         def save(self):
00346                 name, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, '', _('What is the name of this export?'))
00347                 if not ok:
00348                         return
00349                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00350                 fields = []
00351                 for x in range(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() ):
00352                         fields.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item(x).data().toString() ) )
00353 
00354                 ir_export.create({
00355                         'name' : unicode(name), 
00356                         'resource' : self.model,
00357                         'export_fields' : [(0, 0, {'name' : f}) for f in fields]
00358                 })
00359                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )

00362 # Add OpenOffice.org export only if it's available.
00363 if OpenOffice.isOpenOfficeAvailable:
00364         ExportDialog.registerExport('openoffice', _('Open with OpenOffice.org'), False, openOpenOffice)
00365 # Add Excel export only if it's available
00366 if os.name == 'nt':
00367         try:
00368                 from win32com.client import Dispatch
00369                 application = Dispatch("Excel.Application")
00370                 ExportDialog.registerExport('excel', _('Open with Excel'), False, openExcel)
00371         except:
00372                 pass
00373 ExportDialog.registerExport('csv', _('Save as CSV'), True, exportCsv)
00374 ExportDialog.registerExport('html', _('Save as HTML'), True, exportHtml)

00376 # This model holds the information of the predefined exports
00377 # For each item we store the fields list (with the internal name), the name of the export and
00378 # the fields list (with the external -user friendly- name).
00379 class StoredExportsModel( QStandardItemModel ):
00380         def __init__(self):
00381                 QStandardItemModel.__init__(self)
00382                 self.rootItem = self.invisibleRootItem()
00383                 self.setColumnCount( 4 )
00384                 self.setHeaderData( 0, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant('Field list (internal names)') )
00385                 self.setHeaderData( 1, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant('Export id') )
00386                 self.setHeaderData( 2, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _('Export name') ) )
00387                 self.setHeaderData( 3, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _('Exported fields') ) )
00388 
00389         def load(self, model, fieldsInfo):
00390                 if self.rowCount() > 0:
00391                         self.removeRows(0, self.rowCount())
00392                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00393                 ir_export_line = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports.line')
00394                 export_ids = ir_export.search([('resource', '=', model)])
00395                 for export in ir_export.read(export_ids):
00396                         fields = ir_export_line.read(export['export_fields'])
00397 
00398                         allFound = True
00399                         for f in fields:
00400                                 if not f['name'] in fieldsInfo:
00401                                         allFound = False
00402                                         break
00403                         if not allFound:
00404                                 continue
00405 
00406                         items = [ QStandardItem( ', '.join([f['name'] for f in fields]) ), QStandardItem( str(export['id']) ), QStandardItem( export['name'] ), QStandardItem( ', '.join( [fieldsInfo[f['name']]['string'] for f in fields] ) ) ]
00407                         self.rootItem.appendRow( items )
